page.title: 12Settlements-Woolmer Hill
page.content: The housing in{Woolmer Hill}consists of two council estates. These are made up of semi-detached houses with an even distribution of age groups. There are no houses with oil fired heating because it is now too expensive. Gas is cheaper and therefore more popular. Many people in this area have motorbikes and bicycles and cars. As the population density is quite high there are no stables, tennis courts or swimming pools. 5% of the people we interviewed, own boats; 49% have video recorders, and many people have more than one telephone and some, more than one television. Only one household out of the 57 we interviewed owned a black and white television. Only two households owned caravans. Two thirds of people prefer to shop in bulk at a supermarket whilst
